project.description: Run func-install-multihost on a suite of machines of your choosing.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PrivateBuildURL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The URL that the VPX and associated scripts can be downloaded from. Should be the subdirectory that contains os-vpx.xva or os-vpx-devel.xva, install-os-vpx.sh, etc.
If you want to use a central build instead, use Build below.

hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.name: Build
hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.description: A central build, if you don't want to use PrivateBuildURL above.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. This will completely wipe the machine! Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.name: SiteLabel
org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.description:
One of "cambridge", "santa-clara", or "redmond".
Make sure that this matches the ServerN parameters above! If you get this wrong, then you will end up streaming VM images from one site to another, and the build will time out.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Password
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer root password. Leave blank to use the default site password.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Devel
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to use the os-vpx-devel build, as opposed to the release build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PublicNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network or bridge to attach the public network to. Leave blank to use the site default.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ManagementNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network or bridge to attach the Geppetto management network to. Leave blank to use the site default.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GuestNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the network being created by default during the OpenStack cloud setup.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EmailAddress
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The email address to register with the Dashboard. Leave blank to use the site default (if set).
